Description: Use of part of the ground floor (Use Class sui generis - betting shop) to 1 residential unit within Use Class C3 (dwelling), associated alterations

Amalgamation of four flats into a single family dwelling (at lower ground, upper ground, first, second, and third floor) and internal & external alterations including demolition and rebuilding of front boundary wall, rebuilding of rear roof and dormers to match existing and reinstatement of the staircase between lower and upper ground floors. (Linked to 20/00183/LBC)
Conversion of two self-contained flats into single dwellinghouse
Three storey building at rear to create three flats; landscaping; refuse and cycle storage (amended description)
Lawful Development Certificate (Proposed)-Change of use from single dwelling house (Class C3) to Supported Living Accommodation for up to six people (Class C3c).
Conversion of dwellinghouse into three flats (1 x 2 bed and 2 x 1 bed); external alterations; refuse and cycle storage
Application for certificate of lawfulness in respect of a proposed use as a small HMO for up to 6 people (use class C4)

Retention of facade, demolish and rebuild of the house, addition of a two storey side extension, a basement extension including a front and rear light wells, single storey rear extension and a partial side infill extension
